title: Bug 19458 - Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458 - Navigator - Copy Project dialog UI problems. This bug report discusses issues in the Copy Project dialog UI.
OB: The default location checkbox clears the edit box when unchecked. The text in the edit box appears in red color. The on-the-fly validation small error icon is missing.
EB: If I uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location should remain in the edit box. The text in the edit box should be black. The edit box should display the standard on-the-fly validation small error icon.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a single project, named 'test'. 
2. Copy the project. 
3. On the 'Copy Project' dialog: 
   a. Keep the 'Use default location' checkbox checked. 
   b. Verify if it is possible to select and view/copy the default location in the edit box below. 
   c. Optionally, attempt to choose a path close to the default location.
